profileAlternative.headline: Python Developer | Cloud Architect

skills.

feasible enough to take new skills efficiently.

positions.title: Associate Software Engineer
positions.description:
B2CC—Billing to Cash collection in Financial & Risk Business.
Duration : December 2011 till March 2014.
Brief Description:
B2CC Billing to Cash Collection (Thomson Reuters India Pvt Ltd)
The Clients ERP system was designed with Siebel as front end, Oracle 10g EAI as middleware carrying the information from front end to the SAP as the back end of the ERP.
The Information logged in Siebel frontend was the first level data through which the order has to flow to SAP for billing, once the billing is complete in SAP the status information has to be sent back and displayed in Siebel. Oracle 10g EAI was the middleware which exchanges then data between Siebel and SAP for the complete billing cycle. Used SOAP for carrying the Payloads and to change the info of the order at backendResponsibilities:
Have one year of experience in end to end Application support with core focus on SAP SD and ABAP exposure.
• Involved in supporting to daily SAP SD & ABAP related issue.
• Learned SIEBEL CRM basic order process functionality as it is basic interface for B2CC project.
• Involved in end users training and given basic SAP functional training to SIEBEL support team.
• Did root cause analysis of some code failures issues and get them fixed by raising problem management tickets.
• Handling a team of 4 fresher’s, to guide them resolving tickets.
• At the time of ticket resolving some of the easy tickets, provided training instantly to users fixes.

…
see more
